page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox setdisplay method

argument.name: part
argument.description: The part of the list to either hide or show. Values can be "header", "footer", "column-header", "content-header", "content-footer" or "scroller".

argument.name: display
argument.description: Whether or not to display a given part of the list.

page.description: Show or hide parts of the list. The list will automatically be resized if needed.
